message.original: <KC ATTACK1>を押して詠唱、詠唱完了で発動
message.translation: Begin casting by pressing <KC ATTACK1>, and release when the chant completes.

message.original: <KC ATTACK2>を押して詠唱、詠唱完了で発動
message.translation: Begin casting by pressing <KC ATTACK2>, and release when the chant completes.

message.original: マジックボール、マジックトラップ使用時に 自動的に発動
message.translation: Automatically activated when you use either Magick Bolt or Magick Trap.

message.original: 詠唱中、<KC CHANGE_MODE>でスペリング入力モードに切り替え <PADM>右スティックで規定コマンド入力<KEYM>マウス移動で規定コマンド入力</KEYM>
message.translation: While casting a spell, switch to glyph input mode by pressing <KC CHANGE_MODE> <PADM>Input the shown glyph by moving the Right stick. <KEYM>Input the shown glyph by moving the mouse.</KEYM>
While in the air, press <KC JUMP>

message.original: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を押す
message.translation: While climbing an enemy, press <KC ATTACK1>
